    • i_grab_the_jwt

      @When("^I grab the JWT$") public void i_grab_the_jwt()

    • i_use_an_API

      @Given("^I use the (.*?) API$") public void i_use_an_API​(java.lang.String apiName) throws SentinelException
      Creates or retrieves an API with the given name for a determined UID. By using UIDs, we can ensure that parallel tests use the correct API object. TODO: Think about how to cleanup all these APIs
      Parameters:
      apiName - name of the API object to create
      Throws:
      SentinelException - if the API cannot be set
